column5: Poipet City Police Inspectorate and Chinese authorities under the direct command of the Poipet City Anti-Money Laundering Bureau conducted a search and arrested a suspect for intentional injury and forcible confinement in front of a Chinese food store in Poipet.------LYU YULONG
column7: has been referred to the anti-trafficking department for legal action and is reported to be facing deportation to China. ------POST
